title: [Feature] Add debug logging for storage operations
summary: Add optional debug logging for storage operations using Python's logging module. Logging is activated via FLYWHEEL_DEBUG environment variable and logs key operations (load/save/next_id) with DEBUG level.
changes: src/flywheel/storage.py: Added logging import and module-level logger
src/flywheel/storage.py: Added debug logging to load() method
src/flywheel/storage.py: Added debug logging to save() method
src/flywheel/storage.py: Added debug logging to next_id() method
tests/test_issue_2493_debug_logging.py: Added comprehensive test suite for debug logging
acceptance_criteria_met: Import logging module and create module-level logger
Log load operations with file path and todo count
Log save operations with file path, temp file path, and todo count
